trans-unit.source: - All bias vectors should be named "b" followed by the number of the layer they belong to. Example: the bias vector of the first layer will be called "b1".
trans-unit.target: - All bias vectors should be named "b" followed by the number of the layer they belong to. Example: the bias vector of the first layer will be called "b1".

trans-unit.source: - All weight matrices should be named "W" followed by the number of the layer they belong to. Example: the weight matrix of the first layer will be called "W1".
trans-unit.target: - All weight matrices should be named "W" followed by the number of the layer they belong to. Example: the weight matrix of the first layer will be called "W1".

trans-unit.source: Ap'Pear, a graphical user interface for Pear is available for download here: https://lc.cx/gPgP
trans-unit.target: Ap'Pear,Pear的图形用户界面可在这里下载:https://lc.cx/gPgP。

trans-unit.source: Example networks for Lena, with different numbers of parameters are available in the "example" folder, as well as an example running file "example.py" showing how to use Pear to visualize your network.
trans-unit.target: 在 "example "文件夹中可以找到Lena的示例网络,以及一个运行中的示例文件 "example.py",展示如何使用Pear来可视化你的网络。

trans-unit.source: Example networks for Lena, with different numbers of parameters, as well as an example file example.py are available in example.zip, downloadable at: https://lc.cx/gPgP
trans-unit.target: Lena的示例网络,有不同数量的参数,以及示例文件example.py,可以在example.zip中下载,下载地址:https://lc.cx/gPgP。

trans-unit.source: Installing Pear will also install the following packages (if they are not already installed on your system): numpy, Pillow, matplotlib, tensorflow, webcolors.
trans-unit.target: 安装Pear也会安装以下包(如果你的系统上还没有安装的话):numpy、Pillow、matplotlib、tensorflow、webcolors。

trans-unit.source: Pear is a library that aims at offering a visual representation of neural networks. It can read networks built using Google's TensorFlow in and, for each requested layer, draw the associated decision boundaries.
trans-unit.target: Pear是一个旨在提供神经网络可视化表示的库。它可以读取使用 Google 的 TensorFlow 构建的网络,并为每个请求的层,绘制相关的决策边界。

trans-unit.source: Pear is not yet able to work will all types of network: only networks with 2 inputs and 1 output are accepted so far. Moreover, to simplify the parameters extraction, the input networks must follow the following naming convention:
trans-unit.target: Pear还不能适用于所有类型的网络:目前只接受2个输入和1个输出的网络。此外,为了简化参数提取,输入网络必须遵循以下命名惯例。

trans-unit.source: Pear is still in the development process.
The library that makes neural networks appear
To start it, unzip the file and do in your command terminal::
trans-unit.target: 要启动它,解压文件,并在你的命令终端做:。
